jp.go.enri.prml.vb

Class ONDEParameterDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.go.enri.prml.vb.ONDEParameterDistribution

  • public class ONDEParameterDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
    Prior/posterior distribution parameters of the offset mixture of Gaussian and Laplace distributions
    Version:
    1.0.1 (Last update: 06/12/2011)
    Author:
    Masato Fujita (Electronic Navigation Research Institute)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ONDEParameterDistribution

        public ONDEParameterDistribution(int m,
                         int n,
                         double[] offset,
                         double[] p,
                         double[] alpha,
                         double[] a,
                         double[] b)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        m - the number of Gaussian components in the mixture
        n - the number of Laplace components in the mixture
        offset - Offset values (L-dimensional array)
        p - the parameters of Dirichlet prior/posterior distribution of the offset mixing coefficients \omega (L-dimensional array)
        alpha - the parameters of Dirichlet prior/posterior distribution of the mixing coefficients \pi ((m+n)-dimensional array)
        a - the parameters `a' of Gamma prior/posterior distribution of the accuracy parameters \eta ((m+n)-dimensional array)
        b - the parameters `b' of Gamma prior/posterior distribution of the accuracy parameters \eta ((m+n)-dimensional array)

      • ONDEParameterDistribution

        public ONDEParameterDistribution(int m,
                         int n,
                         double[] offset,
                         double p0,
                         double alpha0,
                         double[] a,
                         double[] b)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        m - the number of Gaussian components in the mixture
        n - the number of Laplace components in the mixture
        offset - Offset values (L-dimensional array)
        p0 - the parameters of Dirichlet prior/posterior distribution of the offset mixing coefficients \omega (common)
        alpha0 - the parameters of Dirichlet prior/posterior distribution of the mixing coefficients \pi (Common)
        a - the parameters `a' of Gamma prior/posterior distribution of the accuracy parameters \eta ((m+n)-dimensional array)
        b - the parameters `b' of Gamma prior/posterior distribution of the accuracy parameters \eta ((m+n)-dimensional array)
